short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sell More Work Less on Amazon.com, Find out rank, sales volume, estimated revenue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AMZ Research allows you to see behind Amazon products page. 
1. Search for a keyword or product on Amazon.com
2. When viewing the Amazon results page, you will open the AMZ Research Chrome Extension.
3. You will see valuable behind the scenes data, both from Amazon.com as well as from AMZ Seller System own database.
4. You will see predicted monthly sales per product, as well as how competitive that keyword is.
